About Me

Let me tell you a little about myslef and what I do...

This is how the story has begun

Since youg age I was always fascinated with latest technologies. Bored of going to an ordinary jobs where specific slills werent required and anyone could do the work. Accidently came across a YouTube video where I saw a basic HTML course which fascinated me, this is how I got started. Following watchiong this video I started doing my research on how to become a Web Developer. I have bought several courses from LinkedIn & Udemy which have opened my eyes on what I like and enjoy doing.

UI-UX

UI design and UX design involve very different skill sets, but they are integral to each other’s success. A beautiful design can’t save an interface that’s clunky and confusing to navigate, and a brilliant, perfectly-appropriate user experience can be sunk by bad visual interface design that makes using the app unpleasant.

Visual Design
